title: Cruel Fortune
description: Lose yourself to the dark and glamorous underbelly of the Upper East Side in the second book in USA Today bestselling author K.A. Linde's new billionaire romance Cruel Trilogy.I finally have everything I ever wanted--fame and fortune and literary success.Only one problem: I lost my muse.He was tall, dark, and handsome. Broody, enigmatic, alluring, and right for me in every way.Until he wasn't. Until I lost everything.And I can't lose it all again. I'll do anything to keep it.Even seeing him again...
author: K.A. Linde
